question: How do I check my data balance?
question_sinhala: මගේ දත්ත ශේෂය පරීක්ෂා කරන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: You can check your data balance in multiple ways: 1) Dial *123*2# (free), 2) Open MyLankaTel app and view dashboard, 3) SMS 'BAL' to 1234, 4) Call 1234 and press 2. You'll receive an SMS with your remaining data, validity, and active packages.

question: How do I activate a data package?
question_sinhala: දත්ත පැකේජයක් සක්‍රිය කරන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Activate data packages via: 1) USSD - Dial *123# and follow menu, or use direct codes like *123*103# for Data Max 6GB. 2) SMS - Send package code (e.g., 'DATA6') to 1234. 3) MyLankaTel App - Go to Packages > Data > Select and Activate. 4) Call 1234 for agent assistance. Package is activated instantly and balance deducted automatically.

question: My internet is slow, what should I do?
question_sinhala: මගේ අන්තර්ජාලය මන්දගාමීයි, මම කුමක් කළ යුතුද?
answer: Try these steps to improve speed: 1) Check your data balance - you may have exhausted your quota. 2) Restart your phone or router. 3) Check network signal strength - move to an area with better coverage. 4) Disable VPN if using one. 5) Clear browser cache. 6) Run speed test at speedtest.lankatel.lk. 7) Check for network issues in your area at status.lankatel.lk. If problem persists, call 1235 for technical support.

question: How do I recharge my prepaid account?
question_sinhala: මගේ පෙරගෙවුම් ගිණුම රීචාර්ජ් කරන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Multiple recharge options: 1) MyLankaTel App - Add card and recharge instantly. 2) USSD - Dial *121# and enter voucher PIN. 3) Online - Visit my.lankatel.lk. 4) LankaTel Pay wallet. 5) Scratch cards from shops (scratch and dial *121*PIN#). 6) Bank apps (most banks have LankaTel recharge). 7) Cargills/Keells stores. 8) Service centers. Minimum recharge: LKR 20.

question: How do I pay my postpaid bill?
question_sinhala: මගේ පශ්චාත් ගෙවුම් බිල ගෙවන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Pay your bill through: 1) MyLankaTel App - Cards, LankaTel Pay, bank transfer. 2) Online banking - All major banks support LankaTel payments. 3) LankaTel Pay wallet. 4) Service centers - Cash, card, or cheque. 5) Bank branches - Peoples Bank, BOC, Commercial Bank. 6) Post offices island-wide. 7) Cargills/Keells cashiers. 8) Auto-debit setup. Bills are due by the 15th of each month.

question: I forgot my MyLankaTel app password, how do I reset it?
question_sinhala: මගේ MyLankaTel යෙදුම් මුරපදය අමතක වුණා, එය යළි පිහිටුවන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: To reset MyLankaTel password: 1) Open the app and tap 'Forgot Password'. 2) Enter your registered mobile number. 3) You'll receive an OTP via SMS. 4) Enter OTP and create new password (min 8 characters, 1 uppercase, 1 number, 1 special character). 5) Log in with new password. If issues persist, call 1234 for assistance.

question: How do I get a new SIM card?
question_sinhala: නව SIM කාඩ්පතක් ලබා ගන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Get a new SIM from: 1) LankaTel service centers - Bring NIC (mandatory), instant activation. 2) Retail outlets - Same process. 3) Authorized dealers/distributors. 4) Online order at lankatel.lk (delivery in 2-3 days). Requirements: Valid NIC or passport for foreigners. Cost: Standard SIM - Free (with initial recharge of LKR 50). Nano/Micro SIM available. eSIM available for supported devices.

question: How do I replace a lost or damaged SIM?
question_sinhala: නැතිවූ හෝ හානි වූ SIM ප්‍රතිස්ථාපනය කරන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: For SIM replacement: 1) Visit any LankaTel service center with your NIC. 2) Report lost SIM immediately by calling 1234 to block. 3) Fill replacement form. 4) Pay replacement fee: LKR 100 (standard), LKR 150 (prepaid with balance transfer). 5) New SIM activated within 30 minutes. 6) Your number, balance, and packages transfer to new SIM. For stolen SIM, file police complaint for added security.

question: How do I port my number to LankaTel?
question_sinhala: මගේ අංකය LankaTel වෙත port කරන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Number portability (MNP) process: 1) Ensure your current number is active and has no outstanding payments. 2) SMS 'PORT' to 1234 from your current number to get a Unique Code. 3) Visit LankaTel service center with NIC and Unique Code within 4 days. 4) Fill MNP application form. 5) Porting completes within 3-4 working days. 6) You'll receive SMS when port is complete. Free to port. Your existing balance may not transfer.

question: How do I set up international roaming?
question_sinhala: ජාත්‍යන්තර රෝමිං සකසන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: To activate roaming: 1) Ensure your account is active with sufficient balance (prepaid: min LKR 2000, postpaid: within credit limit). 2) Dial *123*99# to activate roaming. 3) Or call 1234 to enable. 4) Optionally purchase roaming pack from app before travel. 5) Once abroad, enable 'Data Roaming' in phone settings. Postpaid: Roaming auto-enabled. Check destination rates at lankatel.lk/roaming. Coverage in 100+ countries via partner networks.

question: What do I do if my service is disconnected?
question_sinhala: මගේ සේවාව විසන්ධි වූවාම මම කුමක් කළ යුතුද?
answer: Service disconnection reasons and solutions: 1) PREPAID - Low/zero balance: Recharge minimum LKR 20. 2) PREPAID - 90 days inactive: Recharge any amount. 3) POSTPAID - Exceeded credit limit: Make payment to bring within limit. 4) POSTPAID - Non-payment: Clear outstanding + late fee. 5) Suspected fraud: Contact 1234 for verification. Service restores within 15 minutes after payment/recharge. If not restored, call 1234.

question: How do I check and redeem loyalty points?
question_sinhala: මගේ පක්ෂපාතිත්ව ලකුණු පරීක්ෂා කර භාවිතා කරන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Check loyalty points: Dial *123*5# or view in MyLankaTel app under 'Rewards'. Redeem points for: Data packages, Voice packages, Bill discounts (postpaid), Movie tickets, Shopping vouchers, Device accessories. Points earned: LKR 100 spend = 10 points. Points expire after 12 months of inactivity. VIP members earn 2x points. Redeem via app or service centers.

question: How do I transfer balance to another number?
question_sinhala: වෙනත් අංකයකට ශේෂය මාරු කරන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Balance transfer (Yawanna): Dial *123*6*[amount]*[recipient number]# or SMS 'YAWANNA [amount] [number]' to 1234. Minimum: LKR 10, Maximum: LKR 500 per transaction, Daily limit: LKR 1000. Fee: LKR 2 + 5% of amount. Eligibility: Active for 30+ days, minimum balance LKR 20 after transfer. Both sender and receiver must be LankaTel prepaid.

question: How do I contact customer support?
question_sinhala: පාරිභෝගික සහාය සම්බන්ධ කර ගන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Contact LankaTel support: Phone: 1234 (free from LankaTel), +94 11 234 1234 (other networks). Technical: 1235. Billing: 1236. WhatsApp: +94 77 123 4568. Live Chat: lankatel.lk (24/7). Email: support@lankatel.lk. Facebook: @LankaTelSL. Twitter: @LankaTelSupport. Service centers: Island-wide (find nearest at lankatel.lk/locations). VIP customers: 1230.

question: What is the FUP (Fair Usage Policy)?
question_sinhala: FUP (සාධාරණ භාවිත ප්‍රතිපත්තිය) යනු කුමක්ද?
answer: Fair Usage Policy ensures quality service for all users. For 'unlimited' packages: After reaching FUP limit (e.g., 100GB for Data Unlimited), speed reduces to 1-5 Mbps but you continue with unlimited data. For voice: Unlimited LankaTel has 3000 min/month FUP. After FUP, standard rates may apply. FUP limits are specified in package details. FUP resets at package renewal. Check remaining FUP via *123*2#.

question: How do I block spam calls and SMS?
question_sinhala: අයාචිත ඇමතුම් සහ SMS අවහිර කරන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Block spam: 1) Register with Do Not Disturb (DND): SMS 'DND' to 1234 to block all promotional messages. 2) Category blocking: SMS 'DND [category]' to 1234 (categories: BANK, REALESTATE, INSURANCE, etc.). 3) Report spam: Forward spam SMS to 1234 with 'SPAM' prefix. 4) App-based blocking: Enable call blocker in LankaSecure VAS. 5) Phone settings: Use built-in spam filter. DND takes 7 days to activate fully.

question: How do I check if there's a network outage in my area?
question_sinhala: මගේ ප්‍රදේශයේ ජාල ඇනහිටීමක් තිබේද කියා පරීක්ෂා කරන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Check network status: 1) Visit status.lankatel.lk for real-time outage map. 2) SMS 'STATUS' to 1234. 3) Call 1235 (technical support). 4) Check @LankaTelSupport on Twitter for updates. 5) MyLankaTel app has network status indicator. Planned maintenance is announced 24 hours in advance via SMS to affected customers. For outages, estimated restoration time is provided.

question: How do I upgrade from 4G to 5G?
question_sinhala: 4G සිට 5G වෙත උත්ශ්‍රේණි කරන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: To use 5G: 1) Check device compatibility - Must be 5G-enabled phone. 2) Check coverage - Visit lankatel.lk/5g for coverage map (mainly Colombo area currently). 3) SIM upgrade - 4G SIM works for 5G (no change needed for most phones). 4) Enable 5G in phone settings (Settings > Network > Preferred Network > 5G/Auto). No extra charge for 5G - you get 5G speeds with your existing package in 5G areas. Speed depends on package tier.

question: What happens if I exceed my postpaid credit limit?
question_sinhala: මගේ පශ්චාත් ගෙවුම් ණය සීමාව ඉක්මවුවහොත් කුමක් සිදුවේද?
answer: When credit limit is exceeded: 1) Outgoing calls, SMS, and data are barred. 2) Incoming calls still work. 3) You'll receive warning SMS at 80% and 100% usage. 4) To restore: Make a payment to bring balance below limit. 5) Service restores automatically within 15 minutes of payment. 6) Request credit limit increase: Call 1234 or visit service center (subject to approval based on payment history). 7) Set spending alerts in MyLankaTel app to avoid surprises.

question: How do I cancel a value-added service (VAS)?
question_sinhala: අමතර සේවාවක් (VAS) අවලංගු කරන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Cancel VAS: 1) USSD - Each VAS has a deactivation code (e.g., Caller Tunes: *127*0#). 2) SMS - Send 'STOP [service code]' to 1234. 3) MyLankaTel app - Go to My Services > Active VAS > Unsubscribe. 4) Call 1234 and request deactivation. 5) Visit service center. Deactivation is immediate, no refund for current period. Check all active VAS: Dial *123*7# or view in app. Some promotional VAS auto-cancel after trial period.

content: Understanding router indicator lights: POWER - Solid Green: Normal, Blinking: Starting up, Off: No power. INTERNET/WAN - Green: Connected, Red/Off: No internet signal. WIFI (2.4G/5G) - Green: WiFi active, Off: WiFi disabled, Blinking: Data transfer. LAN - Green: Device connected, Blinking: Data transfer, Off: No device. WPS - Blinking: WPS pairing mode. SYS - Blinking: Normal operation. For ONT: PON Green = Fiber connected, LOS Red = Fiber break.

question: How do I set up call forwarding?
answer: Call forwarding setup: FORWARD ALL CALLS - Activate: *21*[number]#, Deactivate: ##21#, Check: *#21#. FORWARD WHEN BUSY - Activate: *67*[number]#, Deactivate: ##67#. FORWARD WHEN NO ANSWER - Activate: *61*[number]#, Deactivate: ##61#. FORWARD WHEN UNREACHABLE - Activate: *62*[number]#, Deactivate: ##62#. CANCEL ALL FORWARDING - ##002#. Charges apply for forwarded calls.

question: How do I enable/disable caller ID?
answer: Caller ID settings: SHOW MY NUMBER (default) - #31#[number] and call. HIDE MY NUMBER - *31#[number] and call (one-time). PERMANENTLY HIDE - Call 1234 to request. Note: Caller ID hiding may not work for toll-free numbers, emergency services, or if recipient has override. Some countries/carriers may not support caller ID hiding.

question: What is the APN setting for LankaTel?
answer: LankaTel APN Settings: Name: LankaTel Internet, APN: internet, Username: (leave blank), Password: (leave blank), MCC: 413, MNC: 02, APN Type: default,supl. For MMS: APN: mms, MMSC: http://mms.lankatel.lk, MMS Proxy: 10.10.10.10, MMS Port: 8080. Most phones auto-configure when SIM inserted. Manual config: Settings > Mobile Networks > Access Point Names > Add.

question: How do I request a detailed bill?
answer: Get detailed bill: 1) MyLankaTel app > Bills > Select month > Download PDF. 2) my.lankatel.lk > Billing > Bill History > Download. 3) Email request to billing@lankatel.lk with account number. 4) Visit service center with NIC (LKR 100 printing fee). Detailed bill shows: Call records (with number prefixes masked), data usage by day, SMS records, VAS charges itemized, tax breakdown.

question: How long is my number valid without recharge?
answer: Number validity (prepaid): Active validity - 365 days from last recharge. Grace period - 30 days after expiry (receive calls only). After grace period - number deactivated and may be reassigned. To keep number active - recharge minimum LKR 20 within 365 days. Postpaid - active while bills are paid, terminated after 90 days non-payment.

question: What emergency numbers can I call?
answer: Emergency numbers (free from all phones): Police Emergency - 119, Ambulance/Medical - 110, Fire Brigade - 111, Accident Service - 1990, Child Protection - 1929, Women's Helpline - 1938, Disaster Management - 117, Traffic Police - 118. These numbers work even without balance/credit and are zero-rated.

question: How do I check my postpaid credit limit?
answer: Check credit limit: 1) Dial *123*9# for current usage vs limit. 2) MyLankaTel app > Account > Credit Info. 3) Call 1234 option 5. Information shows: Total credit limit, Amount used, Available credit, Due date. Request credit limit increase: Call 1234, based on 6+ months good payment history.

question: How do I block my SIM if phone is stolen?
answer: Block stolen SIM immediately: 1) Call 1234 from any phone and report lost/stolen. 2) Provide NIC and security verification. 3) SIM blocked within minutes. 4) Visit service center with NIC and police complaint for replacement. 5) Replacement fee: LKR 100. 6) Balance and packages transfer to new SIM. 7) Consider IMEI blocking for stolen phone - provide IMEI to police.

question: What WiFi security type should I use?
answer: WiFi security recommendations: WPA3 - Best security, use if all devices support. WPA2-PSK (AES) - Recommended for most homes. WPA/WPA2 Mixed - For compatibility with older devices. WEP - Avoid, easily hackable. Open/None - Never use. Password tips: 12+ characters, mix letters/numbers/symbols, avoid dictionary words, change default router password.

question: How do I improve WiFi coverage at home?
answer: Improve WiFi coverage: 1) Position router centrally and elevated. 2) Avoid walls, metal objects, mirrors between router and devices. 3) Keep away from microwaves, cordless phones. 4) Use 5GHz for speed (short range), 2.4GHz for coverage (long range). 5) Consider WiFi extender or mesh system for large homes. 6) Update router firmware. 7) Reduce connected devices. 8) Use wired connection for stationary devices.

question: How do I enable call waiting?
question_sinhala: ඇමතුම් බලා සිටීම සක්‍රිය කරන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Call waiting settings: ENABLE - Dial *43# and press call. DISABLE - Dial #43# and press call. CHECK STATUS - Dial *#43#. When enabled, you'll hear a beep during a call if someone else is calling. Press flash/swap to answer second call. Free to enable, no monthly charge. Works on all LankaTel connections.

question: How do I subscribe to caller tunes?
question_sinhala: කෝලර් ටියුන් සඳහා දායක වන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Caller Tune subscription: 1) Dial *127# and browse songs. 2) SMS song code to 127. 3) MyLankaTel app > VAS > Caller Tunes. 4) Visit callertunes.lankatel.lk. Cost: LKR 30/month + LKR 10 per song. Change tune anytime via *127#. Gift a tune: *127*[friend's number]*[song code]#. Deactivate: *127*0# or SMS 'STOP' to 127.

question: What is LankaTel Pay and how do I use it?
question_sinhala: LankaTel Pay යනු කුමක්ද සහ එය භාවිතා කරන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: LankaTel Pay is a mobile wallet: 1) Download MyLankaTel app and register for Pay. 2) Add money via bank transfer, card, or recharge outlets. 3) Pay for: Bills, shopping, fuel, transport, online purchases. 4) Send money to any mobile number. 5) Withdraw at partner ATMs or agents. Daily limit: LKR 100,000. Monthly limit: LKR 500,000. Zero charges for LankaTel payments.

question: How do I get a fiber (FTTH) connection?
question_sinhala: ෆයිබර් (FTTH) සම්බන්ධතාවයක් ලබා ගන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Get FTTH connection: 1) Check availability at lankatel.lk/ftth or call 1234. 2) Apply online or visit service center with NIC. 3) Choose package (10Mbps to 1Gbps). 4) Pay installation fee (LKR 5,000, waived on 12-month contracts). 5) Installation within 5-7 working days. 6) Free ONT device and WiFi router provided. Requirements: Valid NIC, ownership proof or landlord consent.

question: How do I schedule a technician visit?
question_sinhala: කාර්මික නිලධාරී පැමිණීමක් උපලේඛනගත කරන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Schedule technician visit: 1) Call 1235 and request appointment. 2) MyLankaTel app > Support > Book Technician. 3) Online at lankatel.lk/support. Available slots: 8AM-5PM, Monday-Saturday. You'll receive SMS with date, time, and technician name. Free for: Warranty repairs, LankaTel equipment issues. Charged (LKR 500): Customer device issues, wiring inside premises.

question: How do I change my postpaid to prepaid or vice versa?
question_sinhala: මගේ පශ්චාත් ගෙවුම් පෙරගෙවුම් වෙත හෝ අනෙක් අතට වෙනස් කරන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Change connection type: 1) Visit any LankaTel service center with NIC. 2) Fill conversion form. 3) Postpaid to Prepaid: Clear all outstanding bills first, conversion free. 4) Prepaid to Postpaid: Need income proof/bank statement for credit evaluation. 5) Processing time: 24-48 hours. 6) Your number is retained. 7) Active packages do not transfer.

question: What family plans does LankaTel offer?
question_sinhala: LankaTel පවුල් සැලසුම් මොනවාද?
answer: LankaTel Family Plans: 1) Family Share - Share data pool among 5 numbers, starting LKR 2,500/month for 50GB shared. 2) Family Postpaid - Main line + 4 supplementary lines with shared credit limit. 3) Family Bundle - FTTH + 2 mobile connections at 20% discount. Benefits: Single bill, shared data rollover, free on-net calls within family. Apply: Service center or call 1234.

question: How do I get an eSIM?
question_sinhala: eSIM ලබා ගන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: eSIM activation: 1) Check device compatibility (iPhone XS+, Samsung S20+, Pixel 3+, etc.). 2) Visit service center with NIC and device. 3) Request eSIM (new connection or physical to eSIM transfer). 4) Scan QR code provided to download eSIM profile. 5) Cost: Free for new, LKR 200 for replacement. Benefits: Dual SIM support, no physical card damage, instant activation when traveling.

question: How do I set up parental controls?
question_sinhala: දෙමාපිය පාලන සකසන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Parental controls: 1) Dial *123*77# to enable content filtering. 2) MyLankaTel app > Settings > Parental Controls. 3) Block categories: Adult content, gambling, social media, gaming. 4) Set time limits for internet access. 5) Receive usage reports via email. Free service for LankaTel customers. Requires PIN to disable (set during activation). Also available for FTTH via router settings.

question: What insurance options are available for devices?
question_sinhala: උපාංග සඳහා රක්ෂණ විකල්ප මොනවාද?
answer: Device insurance (LankaGuard): Coverage: Screen damage, liquid damage, theft (with police report), mechanical breakdown. Plans: Basic (LKR 299/month) - Screen only, Premium (LKR 599/month) - All risks. Eligibility: Devices under 12 months old, purchased from LankaTel. Claim: Call 1234 > Option 7. Deductible: 20% of repair cost. Max 2 claims per year.

question: How do I check which packages are active on my number?
question_sinhala: මගේ අංකයේ සක්‍රිය පැකේජ පරීක්ෂා කරන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Check active packages: 1) Dial *123*7# for all active packages and validity. 2) MyLankaTel app > My Packages. 3) SMS 'STATUS' to 1234. 4) Call 1234 and press 3. Information shows: Package name, remaining balance (data/voice/SMS), validity date, auto-renewal status. You can manage or cancel packages from the same menu.

question: How do I set up auto-renewal for packages?
question_sinhala: පැකේජ ස්වයං-අලුත්වීම සකසන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Auto-renewal setup: 1) During package activation, select 'Auto-Renew' option. 2) MyLankaTel app > My Packages > Select package > Enable Auto-Renew. 3) Dial *123# > Package menu > Auto-renewal settings. Requirements: Sufficient balance at renewal time (prepaid) or within credit limit (postpaid). Cancel auto-renewal anytime via same methods. You'll receive SMS reminder 1 day before renewal.

question: What is the process for corporate/business accounts?
question_sinhala: ආයතනික/ව්‍යාපාරික ගිණුම් සඳහා ක්‍රියාවලිය කුමක්ද?
answer: Corporate accounts: 1) Contact enterprise sales: enterprise@lankatel.lk or 1234 > Option 8. 2) Provide: Business registration, tax file, authorized person's NIC. 3) Minimum 5 lines for corporate rates. 4) Benefits: Volume discounts, dedicated account manager, priority support, consolidated billing, custom packages. 5) Apply: Online at lankatel.lk/business or visit enterprise counter at main service centers.

question: How do I report network coverage issues?
question_sinhala: ජාල ආවරණ ගැටළු වාර්තා කරන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Report coverage issues: 1) MyLankaTel app > Network > Report Coverage Issue (auto-captures location). 2) Call 1235 with your location details. 3) Email network@lankatel.lk with address and description. 4) Online form at lankatel.lk/coverage. Provide: Exact location (GPS if possible), time of issue, device model, type of issue (no signal/weak signal/dropped calls). Investigation within 7 days, SMS update provided.

question: How do I get a vanity/special number?
question_sinhala: විශේෂ අංකයක් ලබා ගන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Vanity numbers: 1) Browse available special numbers at lankatel.lk/numbers. 2) Visit service center to check and reserve. 3) Pricing: Silver (pattern numbers) - LKR 1,000, Gold (easy remember) - LKR 5,000, Platinum (premium) - LKR 10,000+. 4) One-time fee plus normal connection charges. 5) Available for new connections or number change. 6) Popular patterns sell out quickly.

question: How do I subscribe to news and alerts via SMS?
question_sinhala: SMS හරහා පුවත් සහ ඇඟවීම් සඳහා දායක වන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: SMS alerts subscription: 1) News alerts: SMS 'NEWS ON' to 1234 (LKR 5/day). 2) Cricket scores: SMS 'CRICKET ON' to 1234 (LKR 10/match day). 3) Weather updates: SMS 'WEATHER [city]' to 1234 (LKR 2/alert). 4) Stock prices: SMS 'STOCK ON' to 1234 (LKR 20/week). 5) Horoscope: SMS 'HORO [sign]' to 1234 (LKR 5/day). Unsubscribe: Replace 'ON' with 'OFF' in any command.

question: What speed tests should I expect for different packages?
question_sinhala: විවිධ පැකේජ සඳහා මට අපේක්ෂා කළ යුතු වේග පරීක්ෂණ මොනවාද?
answer: Expected speeds: MOBILE 4G - Up to 50Mbps download, 15Mbps upload. MOBILE 5G - Up to 500Mbps download, 50Mbps upload. FTTH packages deliver 80-100% of advertised speed via wired connection. Test at speedtest.lankatel.lk for accurate results. Factors affecting speed: Network congestion, distance from tower, device capability, number of users. Off-peak hours (midnight-6AM) typically have best speeds.

question: How do I get a duplicate bill or payment receipt?
question_sinhala: අනුපිටපත් බිල්පතක් හෝ ගෙවීම් රිසිට්පතක් ලබා ගන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Get duplicate documents: 1) MyLankaTel app > Bills > Select month > Download. 2) my.lankatel.lk > Billing > History (last 12 months available). 3) Email request to billing@lankatel.lk with account number. 4) Service center: LKR 50 per printed copy. 5) Payment receipts: Available in app immediately after payment. For older records (12+ months), submit written request to service center.

question: How do I update my registered address?
question_sinhala: මගේ ලියාපදිංචි ලිපිනය යාවත්කාලීන කරන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Update address: 1) Visit any service center with NIC and address proof (utility bill/bank statement). 2) Fill address change form. 3) For postpaid, may require new credit evaluation. 4) Processing: 24-48 hours. 5) Bills and correspondence sent to new address. 6) FTTH customers: Address change requires new installation at new location. Contact 1234 for relocation options.

question: What loyalty tiers does LankaTel have?
question_sinhala: LankaTel සතුව ඇති පක්ෂපාතිත්ව මට්ටම් මොනවාද?
answer: LankaTel loyalty tiers: SILVER (0-5000 pts) - Birthday bonus, exclusive offers. GOLD (5001-15000 pts) - Priority support, airport lounge access 2x/year, 10% bill discount. PLATINUM (15001-50000 pts) - Dedicated manager, lounge access 4x/year, 15% discount, free VAS. DIAMOND (50000+ pts) - Concierge service, unlimited lounge, 20% discount, device upgrade priority. Points earned: LKR 100 spend = 10 points. Tier status reviewed annually.

question: How do I activate night-time data packages?
question_sinhala: රාත්‍රී කාල දත්ත පැකේජ සක්‍රිය කරන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Night data packages: 1) Dial *123*55# for night package menu. 2) SMS 'NIGHT' to 1234. 3) MyLankaTel app > Packages > Night Data. Available packages: Night Unlimited (12AM-6AM) - LKR 49/night, Night 5GB - LKR 99/week. Auto-activates at midnight, expires at 6AM. Cannot be combined with other unlimited packages. Great for downloads and updates.

question: How do I activate YouTube or social media packages?
question_sinhala: YouTube හෝ සමාජ මාධ්‍ය පැකේජ සක්‍රිය කරන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Social media packages: YOUTUBE - Dial *123*88# (5GB for LKR 99/week). FACEBOOK/INSTAGRAM - Dial *123*89# (3GB for LKR 59/week). TIKTOK - Dial *123*87# (4GB for LKR 79/week). WHATSAPP - Dial *123*86# (Unlimited for LKR 49/month). All social packs work 24/7. Data used only when accessing specified apps. Check balance via *123*2#.

question: How do I change my phone number?
question_sinhala: මගේ දුරකථන අංකය වෙනස් කරන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Change number: 1) Visit service center with NIC. 2) Request number change form. 3) Choose new number from available list (or pay for vanity number). 4) Fee: LKR 500 for standard number change. 5) Processing: Immediate. 6) Old number released after 90 days. 7) Balance transfers to new number. 8) Inform contacts of new number - LankaTel can send bulk SMS notification (LKR 100 for 50 contacts).

question: What student discounts are available?
question_sinhala: සිසුන් සඳහා ලබා ගත හැකි වට්ටම් මොනවාද?
answer: Student discounts: 1) Student Data Pack - 20GB for LKR 499/month (50% off regular price). 2) Student Postpaid - LKR 999/month with 30GB + unlimited LankaTel calls. 3) Device discounts - Up to 15% off smartphones. Eligibility: Valid student ID from recognized institution. Register: Visit service center with student ID and NIC. Valid for duration of studies (annual renewal required).

question: How do I set a spending limit on my account?
question_sinhala: මගේ ගිණුමේ වියදම් සීමාවක් සකසන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Set spending limit: 1) MyLankaTel app > Settings > Spending Controls. 2) Call 1234 to set limit. 3) Visit service center. Options: Daily limit (LKR 100-5000), Monthly limit, Per-transaction limit. Alerts: SMS at 80% and 100% of limit. Useful for: Children's phones, budget control, preventing bill shock. Postpaid: Reduces credit limit temporarily. Prepaid: Blocks usage when limit reached.

question: How do I get itemized call records?
question_sinhala: අයිතම කළ ඇමතුම් වාර්තා ලබා ගන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Get call records: 1) MyLankaTel app > Usage > Call History (last 3 months). 2) my.lankatel.lk > Account > Call Detail Records. 3) Service center request with NIC (LKR 200 for printed records). Records show: Date, time, duration, number called (last 4 digits masked), cost. For legal/official purposes: Submit written request with reason, takes 5-7 days, additional verification required.

question: What is zero-rating and which services are zero-rated?
question_sinhala: ශුන්‍ය-ශ්‍රේණිගත කිරීම යනු කුමක්ද සහ කුමන සේවාවන් ශුන්‍ය-ශ්‍රේණිගත කර ඇත්ද?
answer: Zero-rated services (no data charged): 1) MyLankaTel app - All features. 2) lankatel.lk website. 3) Emergency services websites. 4) Government services (gov.lk). 5) LankaTel Pay transactions. 6) Speed test at speedtest.lankatel.lk. 7) Wikipedia (via Wikipedia Zero). Note: Zero-rating works even with zero data balance. Third-party ads within zero-rated apps may consume data.

question: How do I setup conference calling?
question_sinhala: සමුළු ඇමතුම් සකසන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Conference calling: 1) Call first person. 2) When connected, tap 'Add Call' and dial second person. 3) When second person answers, tap 'Merge' or 'Conference'. 4) Repeat to add up to 5 participants. 5) Charges: You pay for each leg of the call. 6) Alternative: Use LankaTel Meet app for free conference calls (up to 25 participants) using data. VoLTE required for best quality conference calls.

question: How do I report a stolen phone for IMEI blocking?
question_sinhala: IMEI අවහිර කිරීම සඳහා සොරකම් කළ දුරකථනයක් වාර්තා කරන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: IMEI blocking for stolen phone: 1) File police complaint first (mandatory). 2) Get your IMEI: Check phone box, or dial *#06# before theft. 3) Visit LankaTel service center with: NIC, police complaint copy, proof of purchase. 4) Fill IMEI block request form. 5) IMEI blocked across all Sri Lankan networks within 24-48 hours. 6) Phone becomes unusable on any network. 7) Can be unblocked if phone recovered (with police clearance).

question: What is LankaTel TV and how do I subscribe?
question_sinhala: LankaTel TV යනු කුමක්ද සහ දායක වන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: LankaTel TV streaming service: 1) Download LankaTel TV app. 2) Subscribe via *123*TV# or app. Plans: Basic (20 channels) - LKR 199/month, Premium (80+ channels) - LKR 499/month, Sports Add-on - LKR 299/month. Features: Live TV, catch-up (7 days), mobile + TV casting. Data: Uses regular data or subscribe to TV data pack (10GB for LKR 149). Free trial: 7 days for new users.

question: How do I check my device warranty status?
question_sinhala: මගේ උපාංග වගකීම් තත්ත්වය පරීක්ෂා කරන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Check warranty: 1) LankaTel purchased devices: Call 1234 with IMEI. 2) Online: lankatel.lk/warranty - Enter IMEI and purchase date. 3) MyLankaTel app > My Devices > Warranty Status. Standard warranty: 1 year manufacturer + 6 months LankaTel extended. Coverage: Manufacturing defects, battery issues. Not covered: Physical damage, water damage, software issues from rooting. Extended warranty available for purchase within 30 days of device purchase.

question: How do I migrate my data to a new phone?
question_sinhala: මගේ දත්ත නව දුරකථනයකට සංක්‍රමණය කරන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Data migration assistance: 1) Visit LankaTel service center with both phones. 2) Free migration service for LankaTel-purchased devices. 3) What transfers: Contacts, photos, messages, apps, settings. 4) Time: 30-60 minutes depending on data size. 5) Alternative: Use manufacturer tools (Samsung Smart Switch, iPhone Move to iOS). 6) Backup to cloud first recommended. 7) SIM contacts: Export to SIM, insert in new phone, import.

question: What accessibility features does LankaTel offer?
question_sinhala: LankaTel ලබා දෙන ප්‍රවේශ්‍යතා විශේෂාංග මොනවාද?
answer: Accessibility services: 1) Visual impairment: IVR in Sinhala/Tamil/English, audio bill summaries, Braille bills on request. 2) Hearing impairment: SMS-based support, video relay service for sign language. 3) Mobility: Home delivery of SIM/devices, doorstep technician service. 4) Senior citizens: Simplified plans, larger text bills, priority queue at service centers. Register for accessibility support: Call 1234 or visit service center with disability certificate.

question: How do I complain about service quality?
question_sinhala: සේවා ගුණාත්මකභාවය ගැන පැමිණිලි කරන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: File complaint: 1) Call 1234 - Get complaint reference number. 2) MyLankaTel app > Support > File Complaint. 3) Email: complaints@lankatel.lk. 4) Online: lankatel.lk/complaints. 5) TRCSL escalation: If unresolved in 14 days, escalate to Telecommunications Regulatory Commission. Include: Account number, issue description, dates, previous complaint references. Response: Within 48 hours. Resolution: Within 7-14 days depending on complexity.

question: How do I get a temporary number for privacy?
question_sinhala: පෞද්ගලිකත්වය සඳහා තාවකාලික අංකයක් ලබා ගන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Temporary/secondary number: 1) LankaTel Second Number service - Dial *789# to activate. 2) Get additional number on same SIM. 3) Cost: LKR 99/month. 4) Use for: Online shopping, classified ads, dating apps. 5) Separate call/SMS logs. 6) Deactivate anytime: *789*0#. 7) Number recycled 30 days after deactivation. Alternative: Prepaid SIM as secondary number (requires NIC registration).

question: How do I enable WiFi calling?
question_sinhala: WiFi ඇමතුම් සක්‍රිය කරන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: WiFi calling setup: 1) Check device supports WiFi calling. 2) Enable in phone: Settings > Connections > WiFi Calling > ON. 3) Must be enabled on LankaTel account - call 1234 to activate. 4) Requires E911 address registration. 5) Works on WiFi when cellular signal is weak. 6) Calls charged at standard rates. 7) Quality depends on WiFi speed (minimum 1Mbps). Free to enable, supported on most smartphones 2018+.

question: What happens to my balance when my number expires?
question_sinhala: මගේ අංකය කල් ඉකුත් වූ විට මගේ ශේෂයට කුමක් සිදුවේද?
answer: Balance on expired number: 1) During grace period (30 days after expiry): Balance preserved, can only receive calls. 2) Recharge to restore: All balance returns. 3) After grace period: Number deactivated, balance forfeited after 90 days. 4) To recover: Visit service center within 90 days with NIC, pay reconnection fee (LKR 200), balance may be restored. 5) After 90 days: Number and balance permanently lost.

question: How do I set up automatic bill payment?
question_sinhala: ස්වයංක්‍රීය බිල් ගෙවීම සකසන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: Auto-pay setup: 1) MyLankaTel app > Billing > Auto Pay > Enable. 2) Add payment method: Credit/debit card, bank account, or LankaTel Pay. 3) Set payment date: On bill date or before due date. 4) Set amount: Full bill or fixed amount. 5) Receive confirmation SMS before each deduction. 6) Cancel anytime via app or call 1234. Benefits: Never miss payment, avoid late fees, earn bonus loyalty points.

question: What is the LankaTel referral program?
question_sinhala: LankaTel යොමු කිරීමේ වැඩසටහන යනු කුමක්ද?
answer: Referral program: 1) Share your referral code (find in MyLankaTel app > Rewards > Refer). 2) Friend signs up with your code. 3) You get: LKR 200 credit when friend activates. 4) Friend gets: LKR 100 bonus data (2GB). 5) Extra bonus: LKR 500 if friend takes postpaid. 6) No limit on referrals. 7) Credits added within 48 hours of friend's first recharge. 8) Track referrals in app.

question: How do I get a SIM for a minor/child?
question_sinhala: අවයස්ක/ළමයෙකු සඳහා SIM ලබා ගන්නේ කෙසේද?
answer: SIM for minors: 1) Parent/guardian must visit service center. 2) Bring: Parent's NIC, child's birth certificate. 3) SIM registered under parent's name. 4) Maximum 2 SIMs per minor per guardian. 5) Parental controls automatically offered. 6) Spending limits recommended. 7) Child cannot do SIM replacement without guardian. 8) Converts to child's name at age 18 (with NIC). Guardian responsible for all charges.
